5'4, 176 lbs.  Ordered XL and I'm glad I did. Ordered the taupe color & the love it.  The shoulders fit perfectly, and it's just very comfortable. I have a bit more of a tummy area and it IS almost snug there, but not  tight or uncomfortable.  I do not like clothes to be form fitting, I like loose fitting clothes, so when I sit down the clothes don't show my rolls.  This shirt didn't do that too much, but I did notice it tends to ride upwards and I have to pull it back down once in a while, and that was today during lunch with friends.  The length is good, covers my butt, so I just pull it up a little to get that more relaxed look back there.  The quality is great especially for the price.  I will order in other colors.

I ordered this top to wear to work and it's perfect. It's light, breathable, and the pleats at the neckline add some great interest without being fussy. It also layers well with a cardigan or jacket! I haven't seen any shrinking or fading when washing on delicate and hanging it to dry, either.

This cute top offers a flowy, comfortable fit, with pleating above the chest adding stylish detail that elevates it beyond a basic top. The 3/4 sleeves provide flattering coverage, making it a perfect choice for year-round wear

I am 5'4" about 170 lbs. and typically order my tops in XL, I ordered this in an XL and it fits as expected.  The fabric is a bit thicker than expected.  It washes and tumbles dry nicely.  I like the tunic length right at the top of the leg.  I ordered the taupe color and it has a bit of a light purple shade to it which I like.

The cut and style of this shirt is very flattering with 3/4 sleeves great for going into fall with subtle detailing across the shoulders. Fabric is comfortable and breathable. The light blue color is very pretty. The sizing runs a tad small. I ordered a large, and it felt a big large up top (neckline a little wide, armpits a little low and saggy) but it fit just perfect around the middle, and I do not have a disproportionately large mid-section. Although it felt a little big on top, it still looks great!
This shirt feels good but the design at the top does not look as good as I had hoped. Passing on to someone who does like how it looks.

This is a nice casual top. I like the 3/4 length sleeves and the color was just as pictured. It did fit a little tighter than I expected though as I would have liked for it to be a little more loose fitting. It’s still ok to wear, but I think I would have liked it a bit more if I would have sized up. I do like the length of the shirt and the scooped neck and pleating design. Overall, a nice, soft shirt but does run a little small.

This blouse is a true classic with a plus!  The stitching across the bodice adds to the interest and looks so trendy.  The fabric is lovely and the workmanship is excellent.  It fits true to size and the color matches the ad photo very well.There are many events that you can wear the blouse.  Because of the classic look it will work for casual to a little more dressy.  I feel you get more for your money that way and will wear it more frequently.  I am totally satisfied!

评论概述: Look like a sexy woman~ Feel like a carefree girl
评论详情: 11.16.24~ Almost passed on this bc every T is too relaxed. I like a relaxed fit but want it to be clear I have feminine curves. Also don't want to look like I'm pregnant.  This is a feminine and sexy in all the right ways.  Fits true to size in large from 36C to pear shaped size 12 hips. It's soft without being clingy. Also dried overnight with a hand wash.  Best part? Has pleats where you want them. Not across your belly but across your boobs.  Most beautiful True Coral color with a hint of melon & confidence for days. Def try one. It'll quickly become a staple piece. Cheers

This top is so cute! I love the texture detail around the neckline. It can be dressed up or dressed down as needed and it looks great with a cute light leather jacket tossed over it. The three quarter sleeves are great too. Seems to run true to size, I'm a large in some and a medium in others but more often than not I'm a medium. I'm a medium in this as well.
Nice top and pretty color. Runs small.

This top is lightweight, soft and flattering. I ordered based on the measurement chart provided. While I should have extra room with the small, I do not. The bust is form fitting as are the sleeves. The rest of the shirt has some room so it isn't form fitting in my torso and has a nice looser look. Overall the sleeves and length of the shirt are shorter than pictured.  Overall, I like the shirt and love the color even though it doesn't fit quite as pictured. I would recommend anyone purchasing go a size up unless you are already well under the size chart measurements. It definitely runs smaller than the sizing chart recommendations probably by about two inches in my case.

I got this shirt for my daughter that she can wear by itself or underneath a sweater. The material is soft and somewhat stretchable. She likes that the sleeves are 3/4 giving it a casual look. She is wearing it with jeans and it looks nice on her. Of course pink is her favorite color and it’s a nice shade not too bright. She likes it.

评论概述: Nice color, smooth texture, fits correctly
评论详情: This top is very nice. I got the Small size and it looks good on a person who is 5'2" and petite. The texture is really soft and comfortable, the material feels good, and the color (Turquoise) is nice as well.

(SPIFF at bottom) The shirt is nice and soft. It is slightly see through so I wouldn't suggest a black bra, unless you don't care about that. If you're someone who gets hot easily, this is a great shirt to stay cool in. As someone who has snowy winters, I'll enjoy not feeling overheated after coming in front the cold. I have my other shirt stuffed around my waist, but it fits my arms and chest quite well. It will lay nicely with whatever bottoms I choose. My only bummers were that the ruffles/upper design lines weren't as fluffy or visible to me, and I'm not going to be able to easily wash this. Since it's thinner material it could pill or get roughed up in the wash machine. So it will go with my gentle washes. You do not need to hand wash it, gentle wash cycle and hang dry will work fine. Maybe the lack of seeing the design is because of my chest size, but I still really like the shirt. I just didn't look as cool as the model. Lol She had more room for the design though. I suggest you buy a few in multiple colors. SMELL: the shirt had no smell to it. Not over perfumed, unpleasant, or factory smelling. PACKAGING: I actually like the bag it came in. It has a zipper along the top and I can use reuse it when packing or to store items. IS IT RECOMMENDED: Yes FEEL: quite soft. thinner material FIT: True to size. I ordered an XL & there's nowhere on the shirt that seems to be stretched out.
It’s a nice top to wear. I really like the color and the design of this top. The fabric is soft and it is comfortable to wear. It fits me well. It has 3/4 sleeves so it good to wear in any weather.

This is a very pretty color, and I love that this top is 3/4 sleeved. The pleats across the bust add a beautiful touch. The neckline looks nice. The fit is as expected, and the length is good. Great for when the weather cools down, but you don’t need a jacket yet. Would look nice with a lightweight cardigan also. Seems lightweight, but made well.

I ordered this OFEEFAN Womens Top in the Light Blue, which is really nice and true to color on the stock photos.  I especially like that it’s not a solid blue, but more of a two-tone blue, which makes it more interesting.  I got the top in the Large size, since most times I wear a size 12-14.  I have to say, though, that this Large size is more of a Medium-Large, because while the shoulder seams are slightly over the shoulders, the torso and arms are more form-fitting, unlike what is shown on the model.  I stay pretty consistent in weight, so I’m pretty sure it’s not me.  If you like a snug look, then this is the top for you.  The pleats are flattering and add to its overall nice design.  In all, it is a very nice top.  Just pay attention to the size measurements on the product page.
